channel.title: training on Neo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in training on Neo's Blog

item.title: Goal for 2019: Exercise more than 150 times.
item.description: Goal for 2019: Exercise more than 150 times In previous two years, because some reasons (excuses), I seldom exercised. In this year, my first goal is to rebuild healthy body. January Gym 10 times, and road running 2 times. I forgot to take my sport watch to weight room 2 times (the red tick on the calendar). February Gym 7 times, and road running 5 times.
